Dank Arson
Logo & Motions Graphics

The Client

Dank Arson is a new Youtube channel by Politial Activist Dana Larsen. The channel covers him creating crazy smoking creations.

The Challenge

Dana wanted a logo that was fun and friendly. He needed it animated as well as an intro to his show.

My Role

  • Logo Design
  • Motion Graphics

My Tools

  • Hand Drawing
  • Adobe Illustrator
  • Adobe After Effects

Getting the Right Look

I used a few photos of Dana as refernce to get the right look for him as a cartoon for his logo.

Upon approval, I sent to work on the typography and graphic elements.

Vectoring the Logo

I thought it would be cool to be inspired by gamers' and athlete's sporting logos and took it from there.

It didn't take long to get a look that everyone was happy with.

Animating Along the Path to Fun

Finally, I put it into motion with Adobe After Effects. I don't get as many chances to animate as I'd like. This was a great chance to exercise that skill.
